en: Auto-launch on login (start on boot) setting
Smarter auto-updater with install-in-progress guard
New extensions: providers tool and EasyClaw tools
Fix truncated chat bubbles and auto-scroll after send
Upgrade OpenClaw engine to v2026.2.23
zh: 支持开机自启动设置
更智能的自动更新，安装过程中防止重复启动
新增扩展：服务商管理工具和 EasyClaw 工具集
修复聊天气泡截断和发送后自动滚动问题
升级 OpenClaw 引擎至 v2026.2.23

en: Chat bubbles now render Markdown with syntax highlighting and copy button
Improved model validation with dynamic provider resolution
zh: 聊天气泡支持 Markdown 渲染，含语法高亮和复制按钮
改进模型验证，支持动态服务商解析

en: Added nonce challenge-response to gateway connect handshake for improved security
Added "Get API key" link in subscription tab for easier onboarding
Split E2E smoke tests into per-page test files for better maintainability
zh: 网关连接握手新增 nonce 挑战-响应机制，提升安全性
订阅标签页新增「获取 API Key」链接，方便用户快速获取
E2E 测试拆分为按页面组织的独立文件，提升可维护性

en: Added inline model switcher in chat status bar
Added new providers: NVIDIA, Qwen Coding, ModelScope
Refactored main process into 6 smaller modules for better maintainability
Merged browser settings into agent section with improved card spacing
Fixed macOS 20-50s stalls by replacing pkill with killall
Fixed CDP browser wrapper to reuse directory across restarts, preserving login state
Upgraded vendored OpenClaw to v2026.2.22
zh: 新增聊天状态栏内联模型切换器
新增供应商：NVIDIA、Qwen Coding、ModelScope
主进程重构为 6 个独立模块，提升可维护性
浏览器设置合并到 Agent 区域，优化卡片间距
修复 macOS 下 pkill 导致的 20-50 秒卡顿
修复 CDP 浏览器包装目录在重启后丢失登录状态的问题
升级内置 OpenClaw 至 v2026.2.22

en: Added CDP mode to connect agent to user's own Chrome browser
Added file path attachment button for chat messages
Fixed streaming text duplication when tool calls arrive during chat
Reverted vendored AMR decoder in favor of ffmpeg-based conversion
Fixed 30s stall detection that wrongly aborted long agent runs
Fixed provider links placement and removed inline styles on STT page
Fixed chat attachments to restrict to images only
Fixed subscription dropdown count assertion for new providers
zh: 新增 CDP 模式，可连接用户自己的 Chrome 浏览器
新增聊天消息文件路径附件按钮
修复聊天中 tool call 触发时流式文本重复显示的问题
移除内置 AMR 解码器，恢复使用 ffmpeg 转换
修复 30 秒超时检测误中断长时间运行的 agent 任务
修复 LLM 服务商链接位置，清理语音转文字页面样式
修复聊天附件限制为仅图片
修复新增服务商后订阅下拉菜单计数断言

en: Added customer service app module for intelligent customer support
Added real-time chat experience with run tracking and stop/reset controls
Added Doubao Seed 2.0 models (Pro-128k and Lite-128k) to Volcengine provider
Reorganized panel navigation with Apps section for modular features
Added i18n support for WeCom configuration error messages
Fixed update banner showing for newer client versions than server
Fixed model catalog synchronization to use extraModels as authoritative source
zh: 新增智能客服应用模块，支持客服场景智能回复
新增实时聊天体验，支持运行追踪和停止/重置控制
新增豆包 Seed 2.0 模型（Pro-128k 和 Lite-128k）
重新组织面板导航，新增应用分区用于模块化功能
为企业微信配置错误信息添加国际化支持
修复客户端版本比服务器更新时仍显示更新横幅的问题
修复模型目录同步使用 extraModels 作为权威源的问题

en: Fixed Windows installer blocking dialogs during upgrade
Fixed installer retry loop when old uninstall registry entries exist
Fixed update API to always return current version
Added staging environment support for update testing
zh: 修复 Windows 安装程序升级时弹出阻塞对话框
修复安装程序因旧注册表项导致的重试循环
修复更新 API 未返回当前版本号的问题
新增 Staging 环境支持，用于更新流程测试

en: Added Linux support (AppImage + deb packages)
Migrated to electron-updater for blockmap differential downloads
Chat: support all file types in uploads and add message timestamps
Fixed device ID generation on Linux using /etc/machine-id
Fixed stale gateway lock file cleanup on startup
Fixed tools.exec config schema path and enabled full access mode
Fixed gateway scope registration for agent exec on host
Fixed local model health checks bypassing Chromium proxy
Fixed E2E test reliability on macOS (count only visible key cards after deletion)
Improved pnpm symlink preservation during development
zh: 新增 Linux 支持（AppImage + deb 安装包）
迁移到 electron-updater，支持增量更新
聊天：支持所有文件类型上传，新增消息时间戳
修复 Linux 设备 ID 生成，使用 /etc/machine-id
修复启动时 gateway 锁文件清理
修复 tools.exec 配置路径，启用完全访问模式
修复 gateway scope 注册，支持主机上 agent 执行
修复本地模型健康检查绕过 Chromium 代理
修复 macOS E2E 测试稳定性（删除后仅计算可见卡片）
改进开发时 pnpm 符号链接保留机制

en: Fixed local model auto-select so save button is enabled immediately
Fixed skills cache not refreshing after install/delete
Fixed Unknown model error from vendor catalog normalization
Fixed unrecognized config keys being rejected on write
Improved E2E test reliability with shorter timeouts and automatic retry
Refactored release pipeline: parallel CI build + local testing
zh: 修复本地模型自动选择，保存按钮立即可用
修复 skill 安装/删除后缓存未刷新
修复 vendor 模型目录规范化导致的「未知模型」错误
修复写入配置时不识别的顶层字段被拒绝
提升 E2E 测试稳定性：缩短超时时间并自动重试
重构发布流程：CI 构建与本地测试并行执行

en: Added local LLM support (Ollama)
Fixed WeChat message reply not working
Fixed Skill Market install failing on Windows due to missing unzip command
Fixed Windows update: kill gateway before install, show progress dialog
Fixed Google OAuth routing through correct Gemini CLI provider
Fixed Windows gateway hang from inherited NODE_COMPILE_CACHE
Fixed Gemini OAuth: require projectId and surface discovery errors
Fixed OAuth error messages now show user-friendly details
Fixed portable exe filename containing spaces that broke release scripts
zh: 新增本地 LLM 支持（Ollama）
修复微信无法回复的问题
修复 Windows 系统 Skill Market 因缺少 unzip 命令无法安装 skill
修复 Windows 更新：安装前关闭 gateway，更新过程中显示进度对话框
修复 Google OAuth 路由到正确的 Gemini CLI provider
修复 Windows gateway 因继承 NODE_COMPILE_CACHE 导致卡死
修复 Gemini OAuth：要求 projectId 并正确显示项目发现错误
修复 OAuth 错误信息现在显示用户友好的详细说明
修复 portable exe 文件名含空格导致发布脚本出错

en: Fixed Kimi Coding 404 error, subscription badge display, and activate persistence
zh: 修复 Kimi Coding 404 错误、订阅标识显示和激活持久化问题

en: Fixed Gemini OAuth failure on IPv6 systems with manual fallback UI
Fixed app unable to quit (gateway restart loop on shutdown)
Faster app startup: skip slow cleanup when gateway port is free
Fixed gateway RPC connection race condition
Fixed missing scope error after vendor upgrade with per-provider API format support
Model dropdown now opens upward when near page bottom
Added device identity authentication for gateway RPC
Fixed port conflicts between E2E test runs
zh: 修复 IPv6 系统上 Gemini OAuth 失败问题，新增手动授权备选界面
修复程序无法正常退出的问题（关闭时 gateway 重启死循环）
更快启动速度：gateway 端口空闲时跳过耗时清理
修复 gateway RPC 连接竞态条件
修复 vendor 升级后的 scope 缺失错误，支持按模型商配置 API 格式
模型下拉菜单在页面底部时自动向上展开
新增设备身份认证用于 gateway RPC 通信
修复 E2E 测试之间的端口冲突问题

en: Smarter timeout detection: replaced fixed timeout with stall detection heartbeat for chat responses
Fixed gateway startup race condition on Windows that caused flaky test failures
Added DevTools shortcut (Ctrl+Shift+I / Cmd+Option+I) in production builds
Fixed update checker crash (currentState temporal dead zone error)
Auto-provision Gemini project for Pro subscribers during OAuth
zh: 更智能的超时检测：聊天响应从固定超时改为停滞检测心跳机制
修复 Windows 上 gateway 启动竞态条件导致的测试偶发失败
生产构建中新增 DevTools 快捷键（Ctrl+Shift+I / Cmd+Option+I）
修复更新检查器崩溃（currentState 暂时性死区错误）
Gemini Pro 订阅用户 OAuth 时自动配置项目

en: Chat now shows real-time agent status (processing, using tools, generating)
Scroll-to-bottom button when chat history is long
Inline tool call records in chat history
Chat settings: toggle agent events display and tool event preservation
Improved DM scope hint text for clarity
Refactored plugin architecture: split openclaw-plugin into policy package + extension shell
Added privacy notice to WeChat Customer Service binding modal
Fixed sharp native binaries missing in packaged app
zh: 聊天现在实时显示代理状态（处理中、使用工具、生成回复）
聊天记录过长时显示回到底部按钮
聊天记录中内联显示工具调用记录
新增聊天设置：可开关代理状态显示和工具记录保留
优化私聊隔离设置的说明文案
重构插件架构：将 openclaw-plugin 拆分为 policy 包和扩展外壳
微信客服绑定弹窗新增隐私声明
修复打包后 sharp 原生二进制文件缺失问题

en: Skills page: browse, search, and install skills from ClawHub
Added MiniMax (Chinese) as a built-in provider
Subscription plans now nest under parent providers for cleaner UI
Fixed dev startup race condition with proxy-router
Fixed native module rebuild conflicts in dev mode
zh: 技能页面：浏览、搜索和安装 ClawHub 技能
新增 MiniMax（国产）内置服务商
订阅计划归入父级服务商，界面更清晰
修复开发模式下 proxy-router 启动竞争条件
修复开发模式下原生模块重编译冲突

en: Per-key usage tracking with pricing breakdown and inline label editing
Auth type badge on provider keys
Fixed Select dropdown clipping in forms
Fixed Windows installer artifact naming
zh: 按密钥用量追踪，支持费用明细和内联标签编辑
服务商密钥显示认证类型标识
修复表单中下拉菜单被裁剪的问题
修复 Windows 安装包文件命名

en: Upgraded Electron 35 → 40 and better-sqlite3 11 → 12
Added E2E testing for both dev and packaged builds (Playwright)
New local CI/CD pipeline: build + test + release from local machines
Improved native module handling for dual Node.js/Electron environments
Lowered Node.js requirement from v25 to v24
zh: Electron 35 → 40、better-sqlite3 11 → 12 升级
新增端到端测试：覆盖开发版和打包后的应用（Playwright）
全新本地 CI/CD 流程：本地构建 + 测试 + 发布
改进原生模块处理，支持 Node.js/Electron 双环境
Node.js 最低版本要求从 v25 降至 v24

en: Robust update ready state, Windows compatibility, and banner UI cleanup
zh: 更新就绪状态更可靠、Windows 兼容性改进、更新横幅 UI 优化

en: Fixed stale extensionsDir paths across installs and Windows compatibility
zh: 修复跨安装的扩展目录路径残留和 Windows 兼容性问题

en: Unified extension loading via single extensionsDir path
Fixed search-browser-fallback plugin path in packaged app
zh: 统一扩展加载路径（单一 extensionsDir）
修复打包后搜索浏览器回退插件路径问题

en: Compress chat images client-side to fit WebSocket 512KB frame limit
Delay update check to avoid startup race condition
zh: 客户端压缩聊天图片以适应 WebSocket 512KB 帧限制
延迟更新检查以避免启动时竞态条件

en: WeCom rebind warning and channel lifecycle events
Fixed updater: fire-and-forget download, un-dismiss banner on active download
Moved search-browser-fallback plugin to extensions/
TypeScript strict-mode and React 19 compatibility fixes
Dependency updates (undici, @types/ws)
zh: 企业微信重新绑定警告和频道生命周期事件
修复更新器：后台下载、下载中重新显示更新横幅
搜索浏览器回退插件移至 extensions/
TypeScript 严格模式和 React 19 兼容性修复
依赖更新（undici、@types/ws）

en: Fixed Windows auto-update failing due to file locks during installation
zh: 修复 Windows 自动更新因文件锁导致安装失败的问题

en: WeCom: image message support (send and receive)
Refactored provider setup with unified configuration form
Added subscription pricing table for providers
Security: disabled open DM policy option
zh: 企业微信：支持图片消息收发
重构服务商设置，统一配置表单
新增服务商订阅定价表
安全：禁用开放 DM 策略选项

en: In-app auto-update: download, verify, and install updates without leaving the app
Web search now falls back to browser when API is unavailable
zh: 应用内自动更新：无需离开应用即可下载、验证并安装更新
网页搜索在 API 不可用时自动回退到浏览器搜索

en: Fix proxy routing for API key validation
Improve Windows compatibility
Polish onboarding OAuth UI flow
Telemetry: add device ID tracking and fix engagement funnel
zh: 修复 API Key 验证的代理路由问题
改进 Windows 兼容性
优化引导页 OAuth 登录流程
遥测：添加设备 ID 追踪并修复用户活跃漏斗

en: Show agent name in sidebar header
Strip internal metadata from chat messages
Updated documentation with WeCom relay and Gemini OAuth details
zh: 侧边栏显示 Agent 名称
聊天消息中去除内部元数据
更新文档：企业微信 Relay 和 Gemini OAuth 说明

en: WeCom Customer Service integration with scene-based auto-binding
Voice message transcription via speech-to-text
ARM64 signing and system proxy support for proxy router
Declare image input support for vision-capable extra models
Mask API key inputs with password fields for security
UI polish for WeCom binding flow and channel registration
zh: 企业微信客服集成，支持场景式自动绑定
语音消息自动转文字
ARM64 签名和代理路由器系统代理支持
为支持视觉的扩展模型声明图片输入能力
API Key 输入框改为密码字段，提升安全性
企业微信绑定流程和频道注册 UI 优化

en: Fix model dropdown clipping and simplify provider setup links
Resolve npm absolute path before launching gateway
Default device management policy to pairing mode when not configured
zh: 修复模型下拉菜单裁剪问题并简化服务商设置链接
启动网关前解析 npm 绝对路径
未配置时默认设备管理策略为配对模式

en: Fix gateway process cleanup on quit (kill entire process tree)
Bypass proxy for channel API calls
Enrich PATH for npm discovery in packaged app
Replace native dialogs with in-app confirm dialogs
Fix channel account add/edit/delete flow
Auto-enable channel plugins on account creation
Fix dropdown clipping in section cards
zh: 修复退出时网关进程清理（终止整个进程树）
频道 API 调用绕过代理
打包应用中增强 PATH 以发现 npm
原生对话框替换为应用内确认对话框
修复频道账户增删改流程
创建频道账户时自动启用插件
修复下拉菜单被卡片容器裁剪问题

en: Add GLM-5 and GLM-5-Code model support with pricing
zh: 新增 GLM-5 和 GLM-5-Code 模型支持及定价

en: Dark/light theme system with premium UI polish
UI improvements: channels table, sidebar overflow, onboarding flow
Rules page: better textarea height, text truncation tooltip, edit alignment
Windows: remove default menu bar, hide agent name on empty chat
zh: 深色/浅色主题系统，高级 UI 打磨
UI 改进：频道列表、侧边栏滚动、引导流程优化
规则页面：文本框高度、截断提示、编辑对齐修复
Windows：移除默认菜单栏，空聊天隐藏代理名称

en: Gemini OAuth: sign in with Google to use Gemini models (no API key needed)
Chat: improved error handling with clear error messages
Providers page: UI improvements and provider key management
zh: Gemini OAuth：使用 Google 账号登录即可使用 Gemini 模型（无需 API Key）
聊天：改进错误处理，显示清晰的错误信息
服务商页面：UI 改进和密钥管理优化

en: Telemetry: client-side tracking with consent dialog and 21-event taxonomy
Locale-based endpoint routing (auto-select CN/US telemetry server)
Dev telemetry toggle for testing
Generate CN update manifest in release script
Fix: chat timeout only applies before first streaming delta
Cleanup: remove leftover wildcard permission code
zh: 遥测：客户端埋点，含用户同意弹窗和 21 种事件分类
按语言环境自动路由遥测端点（中国/美国服务器）
开发模式遥测开关
发布脚本新增生成中国区更新清单
修复：聊天超时仅在首次流式响应前生效
清理：移除多余的通配符权限代码

en: macOS: clicking the dock icon now restores the window when hidden
Windows/Linux: clicking the tray icon toggles window visibility
zh: macOS：点击 Dock 图标可恢复已隐藏的窗口
Windows/Linux：点击托盘图标可切换窗口显示/隐藏

en: Fixed Mac dock icon: prevent child processes from showing extra dock icons
Minor UI polish for What's New dialog
zh: 修复 Mac Dock 图标问题：阻止子进程显示多余的 Dock 图标
「新功能」弹窗 UI 微调

en: Chat page: collapsible example prompts to help new users get started
File permissions: full access mode toggle for simplified setup
Improved file path validation with better glob and home-dir support
zh: 聊天页面：可折叠的示例提示，帮助新用户快速上手
文件权限：新增完全访问模式开关，简化权限配置
优化文件路径验证，改进通配符和主目录路径支持

en: Volcengine STT voice pipeline integration
Region-aware update manifest for CDN routing
Pricing table: CNY support, chat images, sidebar logo & version display
"What's New" changelog modal after version updates
Chat emoji picker
API and telemetry endpoints migrated to dedicated subdomains
Fixed workspace redirect, browser config, permission grants, and provider URLs
zh: 火山引擎 STT 语音识别接入
更新检查支持按地区选择 CDN 节点
价格表增强：人民币显示、聊天图片、侧边栏 Logo 和版本号
版本更新后弹出「新功能」更新日志
聊天输入框添加表情选择器
API 和遥测端点迁移到专用子域名
修复工作区重定向、浏览器配置、权限授予和服务商链接等问题

en: Panel now opens in built-in window (no more external browser)
Minimize to tray when closing the window
Resizable sidebar with drag handle
Reduced redundant API requests with smart caching
Pricing table with scrollable layout
zh: 面板改为内置窗口打开（不再使用外部浏览器）
关闭窗口时最小化到托盘
侧边栏支持拖拽调整宽度
智能缓存减少重复 API 请求
价格表支持滚动显示
